message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that we believe could greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I'm confident it will meet your needs perfectly. I am offering it to you for $150. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you would like to discuss further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget considerations. In light of your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product. This still reflects the value we place on it, while accommodating your current budget constraints.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $135. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $130. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing us to come closer to your desired amount.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $127.50. Would you be willing to sell the product to me at that price?
